打印头文件中的相应值：
  signed char: -128~127
unsigned char: 0~255
  signed short: -32768~32767
unsigned short: 0~65535
  signed int: -2147483648~2147483647
unsigned int: 0~4294967295
  signed long: -9223372036854775808~9223372036854775807
unsigned long: 0~18446744073709551615
直接计算：
  signed char: -128~127
unsigned char: 0~255
  signed short: -32766~32767
unsigned short: 0~65535
  signed int: -2147483646~2147483647
unsigned int: 0~4294967295
  signed long: -9223372036854775806~9223372036854775807
unsigned long: 0~18446744073709551615
